text: qal alkafrwn: rabana amttana mrtyn: hin kunna fi butun amhatna nutafana qabl nufikh alrwh, wahin anqda ajluna fi alhayat aldnya, wa'ahyaytana mrtyn: fi dar aldnya, yawm wulidna, wayawm bueithna min qbwrna, fnhn alan nuqirr bakhtayna alsabqt, fahal lana min tariq nakhruj bih min alnar, wteydna bih 'iilaa aldnya; lneml btaetk? wlkn hayhat 'ana yanfaeuhum hdha alaetraf
